        public static boolean validate(String documentComplete)
                        throws CPFException
        Validates a CPF, without digits.
        Returns:

        CPFException

      • validateDocumentBody

        public static boolean validateDocumentBody(String documentBody)
        Checks the validity of the CPF, indicating as invalid all those who have repeated digits. Eg.: 111111111-11 is invalid.
        Returns:
        true if CPF is valid.
